def vowel_recognition(s):
    return sum((i + 1) * (len(s) - i) for i, c in enumerate(s.lower()) if c in 'aeiou')

def vowel_recognition(s):
    return sum((i + 1) * (len(s) - i) for i, c in enumerate(s) if c in 'AEIOUaeiou')

def vowel_recognition(s):
    return sum((len(s) - i) * (i + 1) for i,ch in enumerate(s) if ch in 'aeiouAEIOU')
